Rend Max
Critical Factor
Damage/Meter
Super Crit Multi
Attack Speed
Damage
Unlocked for free after Workshop Enhancements are researched. Starts at 1x and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a max of 400 levels for x5.

Rend Armor
Requires 50 billion coins to be spent on damage enhancements to unlock. Applies a multiplier to Rend Max, chance, and Mult  of x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.
Level
Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins

Critical Factor
Requires 500 billion coins to be spent on enhancements to unlock. Increases Crit Factor by 1.0x when unlocked and increases by 0.1 per level. Has 400 levels for a maximum of x5.

Coins

Damage/Meter
Requires 5 trillion coins to be spent on attack enhancements to unlock. Increases the Damage/Meter multiplier by x1 when unlocked and increases by 0.01x per level. Has a maximum level of 400 for a 5x bonus.

Value
Coins
Expand
Total Coins

Super Crit Multi
Requires 50 Trillion coins to be spent on enhancements to unlock. Increases Super Crit Multi by x1.0 when unlocked and increases by 0.1 per level. Has a maximum of 400 levels for a x5 multiplier.

Attack Speed
Requires 500 Trillion coins to be spent on enhancements to unlock. Increases Attack Speed by x1.0 when unlocked and increases by 0.01 per level. Has 75 levels for a max of 1.75x.
